class.name: HeightMapShape
class.description: Height map shape resource, which can be added to a [PhysicsBody] or [Area].

members.member: Height map data, pool array must be of [member map_width] * [member map_depth] size.
Number of vertices in the depth of the height map. Changing this will resize the [member map_data].
Number of vertices in the width of the height map. Changing this will resize the [member map_data].
